name: UNMAKER.
description:
UNMAKER. is a twin-stick shooter with dark vibes and a monochromatic style (black/white + touches of red), a mix of nuclear throne/doom/sin city.

I've made a "survival mode" for the prototype, where you kill waves of enemies.
Final game will be more "rogue-lite" with dungeons and different environments.

The goal of this prototype is to fine tune the game feel and make it tight and satisfying.

Feel free to give me feedbacks and I hope you'll enjoy it!!!
